# CMake command, generate .cxx and .h from .fl files
fltk_wrap_ui (cisstMultiTaskCodeGeneratorExample1
              displayUI.fl)

# create initialization code using the component generator
cisst_component_generator (cisstMultiTaskCodeGeneratorExample1
                           displayTask.h
                           sineTask.h)
# to compile cisst generated code, need to find header file
include_directories (${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR})

# name the main executable and specifies with source files to use
add_executable (cisstMultiTaskCodeGeneratorExample1
                # code files to compile
                sineTask.cpp
                displayTask.cpp
                example1.cpp
                # header files are provided for information
                sineTask.h
                displayTask.h
                # files generated by fluid
                ${cisstMultiTaskCodeGeneratorExample1_FLTK_UI_SRCS}
                # file generated by cisstComponentGenerator
                ${cisstMultiTaskCodeGeneratorExample1_CISST_CG_SRCS}
                )

# link with the cisst libraries
cisst_target_link_libraries (cisstMultiTaskCodeGeneratorExample1 cisstCommon cisstOSAbstraction cisstMultiTask)
